messages.subject: Re: Shinsengumi Gunrou-den Screen Saver (OSX)
messages.msgSnippet: It s more like a short TV commercial and the images are promo artwork like the wallpaper I posted. ~Seven
messages.messageBody:
It's more like a short TV commercial and the images are promo artwork like the wallpaper I
posted.

~Seven

> Seven,

> Mac. Is it a slideshow-type screensaver, or something more complex? If
> it is a slideshow, are the pictures actual captures of the game screens,
> or promo artwork like the wallpaper you posted?
>
> Thanks,
> Chuck

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Shinsengumi Gunrou-den Screen Saver (OSX)
messages.msgSnippet: Seven, Since I did buy and enjoy this game,  I appreciate you posting the wallpaper (which is even now adorning one of my desktops). I have a question on the
messages.messageBody:
Seven,

Since I did buy and enjoy this game, I appreciate you posting the
wallpaper (which is even now adorning one of my desktops). I have a
question on the screen saver, though, as I don't have ready access to a
Mac. Is it a slideshow-type screensaver, or something more complex? If
it is a slideshow, are the pictures actual captures of the game screens,
or promo artwork like the wallpaper you posted?

Thanks,
Chuck
